name: Silver Fortnight
tagline: This repository contains the template of Silver Fortnight.
body:
### Welcome to Silver Fortnight.
Silver Fortnight connects to its blog to target audiences for the perfect blogging experience. At this time, our team learned the importance of applying classic blogging techniques to modern strategies from experts in the field, including the various people. Recently It finished a research paper on customer conversion and participated in a group project on improving SEO.

### About Us
Founded in 2020, Silver Fortnight has come a long way from its beginnings in Kolkata. When our team first started out, our passion for publishing quality rich articles. drove them to start their own blog.
### Authors and Contributors
Author and Admin of Silver Fortnight is @iamsuryakant or [https://github.com/iamsuryakant]. And Team.

### Support or Contact
We hope you enjoy our Services as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us through email ( contact@silverfortnight.xyz ) or fill up the contact form in website [ https://www.silverfortnight.xyz/p/contact-us.html ].
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
